dct_title_s: Carrières de France : roches et minéraux industriels : exploitations actives / S. Colin [and others] ; BRGM ; Société de l'industrie minérale.
dct_description_sm: Geodetic system: RGF93 [ Réseau Géodésique Français 1993]. This map is an inventory of the authorized active quarries for industrial mineral purposes (old and new) located in the metropolitan areas. Includes inset map of Corsica. Includes information on industrial minerals and quarries of France and their usage.
dct_creator_sm: France. Bureau de recherches géologiques et minières
